title: White Sands National Monument: First Amendment Information
body: First Amendment        NPS PHOTO   Â    For persons who would like to exercise their first amendment right via holding a public assembly or meeting at White Sands National Monument, a permit is required.  First Amendment and Public Assembly activities are limited to areas designated in the Superintendent's Compendium. The application for first amendment requests is not available online.  For more information on how to obtain a permit, please contact the Special Park Use Coordinator at (575) 479-6124 ext. 222.  All requests must be approved by the Superintendent.
